# PED::SET_PED_CAN_PLAY_AMBIENT_ANIMS

## Summary
Sets that a ped can play ambient idle anims. Even if set, ped can still play ambient base anims

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** alllowAmbientAnims
